params.proposalIndex: The index of the proposal within the list of proposals for the given show.
params.showId: The unique identifier of the show containing the proposal.

params.proposedDates: List of potential dates for the show.

getDateVotes(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves the number of votes for a specific date for a show

getHasDateVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if a user has voted for a date for a show

getHasTicketOwnerVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if a ticket owner has voted for a venue

getHasVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if a user has voted on a show proposal

getPreviousDateVote(bytes32,address).notice: Retrieves the previous date vote of a user for a show

getProposal(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieves a specific proposal for a show by its index.

getProposalPeriod(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the proposal period for a specific show

getProposalsCount(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the count of proposals for a specific show.

getRefunds(address).notice: Retrieves the amount of refund owed to a proposer

getSelectedDate(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the selected date for a show

getSelectedProposalIndex(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the index of the selected proposal for a show
